abstract.t: This document defines a means of remotely initiating MultiprocalLabel Switched Protocol Pings on Label Switched Paths. A proxyping request is sent to any Label Switching Routers along a LabelSwitched Path. The primary motivations for this facility arefirst to limit the number of messages and related processing whenusing LSP Ping in large Point-to-Multipoint LSPs, and second toenable leaf to root tracing.Contents
